title: Ping issues and questions
body:
So my ping is terrible at my house and I am curious what others ping is at compared to mine. I have 15mbps DSL which is crap but all I can get at my location and my average ping on the loading screen is 85-115. Once I get in game it constantly jumps from 85-350 and some nights after 10pm it will get to be unplayable. 

Are there any in game settings that could help this?

replies.body:
Inconsistencies in latency (ping) are often caused by routing issues to our servers, however, they can also be caused by certain local network settings. Just to eliminate the easy stuff, I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local shiz is good, mate.

Slap a reply my way if you happen to still see issues with your ping.
